headline: AI Is Causing a Memory Shortage. Why Producers Aren’t Rushing to Make a Lot More.
summary: The world needs a lot more memory chips and hard drives.  The boom-and-bust memory business has been enjoying its biggest boom in years—perhaps ever.  The rapid build-out of infrastructure for artificial intelligence is consuming a large portion of available supply of NAND flash memory, DRAM memory and hard drives.

content.title: AI Is Causing a Memory Shortage. Why Producers Aren’t Rushing to Make a Lot More.
content.summary: The world needs a lot more memory chips and hard drives.  The boom-and-bust memory business has been enjoying its biggest boom in years—perhaps ever. headline: Magnificent 7’s Stock Market Dominance Shows Signs of Cracking
summary: For the first time since 2022, when the Federal Reserve started raising interest rates, the majority of the Magnificent 7 tech giants performed worse than the S&P 500 Index.  While the Bloomberg Magnificent 7 Index rose 25% in 2025, compared with 16% for the S&P 500, that was only because of the enormous gains by Alphabet Inc. and Nvidia Corp.  Suddenly stock picking within the group is crucial.

content.title: Magnificent 7’s Stock Market Dominance Shows Signs of Cracking
content.summary: For the first time since 2022, when the Federal Reserve started raising interest rates, the majority of the Magnificent 7 tech giants performed worse than the S&P 500 Index. Suddenly stock picking within the group is crucial.

headline: Alibaba Steps Up AI Race With Potential Nvidia Mega Order
summary: Alibaba Group Holding Ltd. (NYSE:BABA) stock rose Thursday after reports signaled expanded access to Nvidia Corp.'s (NASDAQ:NVDA) advanced artificial intelligence chips in China. The Chinese e-commerce giant pared some of those gains in early Friday trading, following a rally of more than 5% the prior session. headline: Top AI stock picks: Is it Nvidia or bust?
summary: Which stock is the best artificial intelligence (AI) play for investors: Nvidia (NVDA), Intel (INTC), or AMD (AMD)? D.A. Davidson head of technology research Gil Luria, Wedbush Securities managing director and global head of technology research Dan Ives, and Yahoo Finance Senior Reporter Ines Ferré join Opening Bid host Brian Sozzi to share their takes on the names. To watch more expert insights and analysis on the latest market action, check out more Opening Bid.

content.title: Top AI stock picks: Is it Nvidia or bust?
content.description:
Which stock is the best artificial intelligence (AI) play for investors: Nvidia (NVDA), Intel (INTC), or AMD (AMD)?

D.A. Davidson head of technology research Gil Luria, Wedbush Securities managing director and global head of technology research Dan Ives, and Yahoo Finance Senior Reporter Ines Ferré join Opening Bid host Brian Sozzi to share their takes on the names.

To watch more expert insights and analysis on the latest market action, check out more Opening Bid.
content.summary: Which stock is the best artificial intelligence (AI) play for investors: Nvidia (NVDA), Intel (INTC), or AMD (AMD)? D.A. Davidson head of technology research Gil Luria, Wedbush Securities managing director and global head of technology research Dan Ives, and Yahoo Finance Senior Reporter Ines Ferré join Opening Bid host Brian Sozzi to share their takes on the names.
